it.polimi.se2018.network.client.rmi

Class RMIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.client.AbstractClient
      • it.polimi.se2018.network.client.rmi.RMIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRMIClient, java.rmi.Remote 

    public class RMIClient
extends AbstractClient
implements IRMIClient
    Class based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. The class define the RMI client for every single player. Extends AbstractClient class in order to implement and facilitate Client connection.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

      RMIClient(ClientController clientController, java.lang.String serverIpAddress, int serverPort)
      RMI Client constructor.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectToServer()
      Remote method used to establish a connection with the RMI Registry (on the server).
      void disconnect()
      Remote method used to disconnect a client from the server.
      void login(java.lang.String nickname)
      Remote method used to log the user to the server with his nickname.
      void ping()
      Remote method used to ping the client.
      void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
      Remote method used to send to the server a request to unleash an event.
      void sendEventToView(EventView eventClient)
      Remote method used to send to the client an update of the game.

        public RMIClient(ClientController clientController,
                 java.lang.String serverIpAddress,
                 int serverPort)
        RMI Client constructor.
        Parameters:
        clientController - client interface, used as controller to communicate with the client.
        serverIpAddress - server address.
        serverPort - port used from server to communicate.
